senses: [{"definition":"An animal of the family Felidae:","example":null},{"definition":"A person:","example":null},{"definition":"A strong tackle used to hoist an anchor to the cathead of a ship.","example":null},{"definition":"Short form of cat-o'-nine-tails.","example":null},{"definition":"A sturdy merchant sailing vessel (now only in \"catboat\").","example":null},{"definition":"The game of \"trap and ball\" (also called \"cat and dog\").","example":null},{"definition":"The pointed piece of wood that is struck in the game of tipcat.","example":null},{"definition":"A vagina, a vulva; the female external genitalia.","example":null},{"definition":"A double tripod (for holding a plate, etc.) with six feet, of which three rest on the ground, in whatever position it is placed.","example":null},{"definition":"A wheeled shelter, used in the Middle Ages as a siege weapon to allow assailants to approach enemy defences.","example":null},{"definition":"To hoist (the anchor) by its ring so that it hangs at the cathead.","example":null},{"definition":"To flog with a cat-o'-nine-tails.","example":null},{"definition":"To vomit.","example":null},{"definition":"To go wandering at night.","example":null},{"definition":"To gossip in a catty manner.","example":null}]
